sentence.Network_en: Preventing a terrorist or a disgruntled employee from contaminating milk, juice, produce, meat or any type of comestible is a daunting problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 防止恐怖份子或怀恨在心的员工污染牛奶、果汁、农产品、肉类或各种食品，是个相当繁复且庞杂的工作。

list.abs: according to Danone , Wahaha is making and selling pots of yoghurt and other comestibles to erstwhile clients of the venture without putting a penny in the joint cash-till .达能表示，娃哈哈在生产酸奶及其它食品，并将其售予合资企业从前的客户，而收入丝毫未由双方共同分享。

the application of frying in vacuum to comestible industry becomes more and more popular and has broad prospects because of its advantages .真空油炸是一种越来越受欢迎的食品加工技术，凭借自身的优点表现出广阔的发展前景。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Old French, from medieval Latin comestibilis, from Latin comest- 'eaten up', from the verb comedere, from com- 'altogether' + edere 'eat'

means.word_mean: 1. any substance that can be used as food
